decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those described on the proposed drawings (P/576/01, 02, 03, 04, Location Plan received 23/04/2015).

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (P/576/01, 02, 03, 04, Location Plan received 23/04/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 13 Woodland Gardens.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a detached garage in rear garden
